MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G23 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Carbost Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:58am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a damaged underground cable caused by a third party and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:04pm on the 19th of March 2021.
